name: Lobbies
description: Lobby & player management. Create & join lobbies instantly.

find_or_create.name: Find Or Create Lobby
find_or_create.description: Finds a lobby or creates one if there are no available spots for players.

join.name: Join Lobby
join.description: Add a player to an existing lobby.

set_lobby_ready.name: Set Lobby Ready
set_lobby_ready.description: Called on lobby startup after initiation to notify it can start accepting player. This should be called after operations like loading maps are complete.

set_player_connected.name: Set Player Connected
set_player_connected.description: Called when a player connects to the lobby.

set_player_disconnected.name: Set Player Disconnected
set_player_disconnected.description: Called when a player disconnects from the lobby.

find.name: Find Lobby
find.description: Finds an existing lobby with a given query. This will not create a new lobby, see `find_or_create` instead.

force_gc.name: Force Garbage Collection
force_gc.description: Rarely used. Forces the matchmaker to purge lobbies & players.

fetch_lobby_manager_state.name: Fetch Lobby Manager State
fetch_lobby_manager_state.description: See full state of the lobby manager for debugging.

reset_lobby_manager_state.name: Reset Lobby Manager State
reset_lobby_manager_state.description: Reset lobby manager state. For debugging only.

lobby_aborted.name: Lobby Aborted
lobby_aborted.description: Lobby stopped while attempting to join.

lobby_create_missing_players.name: Lobby Create Missing Players
lobby_create_missing_players.description: When creating a lobby with `config.lobbies.autoDestroyWhenEmpty`, a lobby must be created with players in order to avoid creating an empty lobby.

lobby_full.name: Lobby Full
lobby_full.description: No more players can join this lobby.

more_players_than_max.name: More Players Than Max
more_players_than_max.description: More players were passed to the create lobby than the number of max players in a lobby.

player_already_connected.name: Player Already Connected
player_already_connected.description: The player has already connected to this server. This error helps mitigate botting attacks by only allowing one scoket to connect to a game server for every player.

player_disconnected.name: Player Disconnected
player_disconnected.description: The player has already disconnected from the server. Create a new player for the specified lobby using the `join` script.

no_matching_lobbies.name: No Matching Lobbies
no_matching_lobbies.description: No lobbies matched the given query.

too_many_players_for_ip.name: Too Many Players For IP
too_many_players_for_ip.description: The player has too many existing players for the given IP.

cannot_mutate_lobbies.name: Cannot Mutate Lobbies
cannot_mutate_lobbies.description: This backend doesn't let you create or destroy lobbies.

lobby_token_required.name: Lobby Token Required
lobby_token_required.description: A lobby token was not provided when required for authentication.

build_not_found.name: Build Not Found
build_not_found.description: Build not found. Check that there is a build with the provided version & that the bulid is enabled.
